data.text: @ChrisDrader @PremierScottMoe The carbon tax is only a tax levy, not real proactive method of preserving the world. The CPC are not scientists, and its dangerous what they are proposing!
@1glorious @ChrisDrader @PremierScottMoe Uh yeah he did. Our numbers are way down and your movement got crippled.
@ChrisDrader @PremierScottMoe @ChrisDrader Dreamer on weed! Trudeau didn’t manage the pandemic or the Convoy. I thought you people were supposed to be throwing out your Russian Vodka!!!

@ChrisDrader @PremierScottMoe You’re forgetting Trudeau lost the popular vote twice. This comparison is also lame. How many Liberal leader did Harper get rid of? or reduce the Liberals to be behind the NDP?
